message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which holds immense value for us at $1,200,000. Given its exceptional quality and the unique benefits it offers, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. I am offering this product to you at an exclusive price of $1,100,000, hoping to make this opportunity even more appealing. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase. Looking forward to your positive response.
